author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
Andreas, 3 kg is more than 6 pounds! To me that's heavy when it's all jammed into one bag. I'm trying to stay under a pound (0.45 kg), which means one body (DSLR) and one lens.

If I were to get the Olympus, I'd still go out with only one lens! Well, maybe 2 - or if they now have a decent zoom, then it'd be a tad heavier than a single prime.
